data.enText: a change or set of changes to sth
He made some minor revisions to the report before printing it out.
data.chText: 在将报告打印出来之前，他作了一些小小的修改。

data.enText: the act of changing sth, or of examining sth with the intention of changing it
a system in need of revision
the process of learning work for an exam
Have you started your revision yet?

simple_means.memory_skill: revis(e) 校正;修订 + -ion 行为,状态

tr: the act of revising or altering (involving reconsideration and modification)
example: it would require a drastic revision of his opinion

tr: something that has been written again

example.ex: The phase of writing that is actually most important is revision...
example.tran: 实际上写作过程中最重要的阶段是修改。

example.ex: A major addition to the earlier revisions of the questionnaire is the job requirement exercise.
example.tran: 之前对问卷的修改主要是增加了一些和工作要求有关的问题。

value.def: To make a revision of something that is written or something that has been decided means to make changes to it in order to improve it, make it more modern, or make it more suitable for a particular purpose.

example.ex: Some girls prefer to do their revision at home.
example.tran: 有些女孩更愿意在家复习功课。

value.def: When people who are studying do revision, they read things again and make notes in order to prepare for an examination.

value.boxr_value: in AM, use 美国英语用 review
